text:
e="preserve">Niti Shah (born 1996) in Kathmandu, Nepal is a Nepalese actress, model and Miss Nepal International Title titleholder. She has won most popular face of EnVogue and was declared first runner-up in Face's House of Fashion 2013. She represented Nepal at Miss International 2017 which was held in Japan.
She has been featured on "TEENZ", "VOW", "Naari", "Navyaata", and many other fashion magazines. She has walked many times in runway for fashion shows, including TGIF Nepal Fashion Week.
